text: Alberto Raposo Jiménez (born 16 November 1987) is a Dominican Republic male badminton player. In 2011, he competed at the 2011 Pan American Games in Guadalajara, and in 2014 he also competed at the Central American and Caribbean Games in Veracruz, Mexico. He was the bronze medalist at the 2013 Pan Am Badminton Championships in the men's doubles event partnered with Nelson Javier. ==Achievements== ===Pan Am Championships=== Men's Doubles {| class="sortable wikitable" style="font-size: 90%;" !|Year !|Venue !|Partner !|Opponent !|Score !|Result |- |- style="background:#CDFFF4" |align="center"|2013 |align="left"|Palacio de los Deportes Virgilio Travieso Soto, Santo Domingo, Dominican Republic |align="left"| Nelson Javier |align="left"| Adrian Liu Derrick Ng |align="center"|9-21, 10-21 |style="text-align:left;
